Getting up to sprint to the bathroom, Nicole covers her mouth, praying she will not get sick on her carpet or furniture. She slams through her bathroom door, immediately letting the contents of her stomach loose into the toilet bowl. “Uhh… what’s wrong with me?” She quietly asks herself.

Flushing the toilet, she walks out into her living room, plopping down onto the couch. Immediately, she notices the initial bulge has yet to go away, despite her pajamas feeling loosened after throwing up.

“Mom, I’m back.” Nicole hears her daughter call out as she opens the door.

“Back so soon?” Nicole rubs her bulge, noticing there is a lack of give.

“Yeah, Christine was feeling pretty sick.” Alissa shuts the front door behind her.

“I wonder if it was from all the booze.” Nicole jokes, trying to take her abdominal bulge off of her mind.

“Ha, ha.” Alissa sarcastically replies as she takes her shoes off. “You still need to grab groceries.”

“I know, I know, I’ll get to it.” Nicole says as she stares down at her stomach.
151322211111.title: Follow Nicole

choices: Only one, yet her pregnancy lasts a week
1513222111112.title: The pregnancy progresses in growth spurts

choices: She feels the shape of something in her mother's womb!
15132221111121.content:
Nicole groans as she doubles over, her stomach giving her unpleasurable feelings.

“You okay, mom?” Alissa asks her mom as she approaches the coach.

“Yeah, I’m fine-” Nicole is forced upward as her belly slowly swells outward before their eyes, the lower button of her pajamas immediately torn away.

“Mom?!”

Nicole’s belly surges outward, quickly passing for being due, and it continues to grow!

“It’s okay, sweetie…” Nicole groans as her belly passes the twin mark.

Finally, her belly ceases growth once it could be confused for being due with triplets.

“Hoo… hoo… hoo…”

“Mom, we gotta get you to a hospital!” Alissa says as she tugs on her mother’s arm.

“No, Alissa… Odds are they’ll take me away for a long time… I’ll be fine… trust me… I’m not missing your graduation Friday.” Nicole breathlessly sighs as she smiles to reassure her daughter.

“But- mom-”

“Trust me…” Nicole places a hand on her belly. “Whatever’s in here, I’ll get it out somehow sometime. It’s not staying in my belly forever. Shouldn’t be too hard, I gave birth to you, didn’t I?” Nicole chuckles as her daughter stares in awe. “Alissa.” Nicole says sternly.

“Y-Yes, mom…?”

“I’m going to be fine. We’re just going to act like nothing’s changed, got it?”

“I… I don’t know how we can do that.” Alissa whispers.

“Simple. Pretend this big belly here doesn’t exist.” Nicole pats her swell. “Or pretend it’s been this big for a long time.” Nicole reaches out and grabs her daughter's hand, placing it on her belly. “Hey, better me than you, eh?”

Alissa gasps as….
15132221111121.title: Only one, yet her pregnancy lasts a week

151322211111211.content:
Alissa gasped as she felt something move under the skin of her mother’s belly.

“I’m… pregnant?” Nicole asks as she stares down at her belly.

“Mom… you really need to see someone!”

“Alissa, honey, calm down… or else I might explode.” Nicole takes her free hand and places it on her daughter’s shoulder.

“Mom, how can you be so calm at a time like this?!”

“Well, if I’m not calm, there’s a chance I could explode… and I don’t mean figuratively…”

“Mom, you still should be freaking out!” Alissa tries to pull her hand away from her mother’s belly, yet Nicole’s hand refuses to let go.

“Alissa, a woman’s emotions affect the baby during pregnancy. Whenever I would get really happy or really angry, you would kick up a storm. Now, I don’t know what’s in me, but if I don’t keep a level head, well, I don’t know anything about what’s in my belly, but it could turn out like Alien.” Nicole lets go of her daughter’s hand, rubbing the spot where her passenger moved.

Nicole is alerted as she feels something brush against the opposite side of her belly.

“Am I… is it… twins?” Nicole asks as she removes her hand from Alissa’s shoulder, rubbing that spot as well.

A kick to her navel has her guessing again.

“T-Triplets?” She presses into her belly, feeling the objects within. “Alissa… I feel… three things… I’m having triplets of something.”

Alissa is still staring at her mother in awe.

“Alissa, come on. Let’s watch a movie or something.” Nicole reaches for a remote on an end table next to the couch.
151322211111211.title: She feels something kick!

choices: They watch the movie all the way through with no interruption
Something catches their attention during the movie
1513222111112111.content:
“Fine…” Alissa falls down onto the couch next to her heavily pregnant mother. Despite her mother’s attempts to reassure her, the contents of Nicole’s belly has Alissa concerned, especially since she has no idea what is in there.

Trying to remain calm, Nicole has one hand on her belly, the other holding the television remote.

“Alissa, trust me, everything’s going to be okay.” Nicole tells her daughter with eyes locked on her television, pressing buttons until she turns her DVD player on.

Alissa and Nicole both sit in silence as they watch a movie, much to their dismay- a horror movie. Despite the movie being in the DVD player already, neither one stood up to change the movie, deciding to bear through it.
1513222111112111.title: They watch a movie

15132221111121112.content:
“Jasmine, what’s wrong?!” A female voice calls out through the television speaker.

“Hoo… hoo… hoo…” A heavily pregnant woman clutches her belly as a swipe runs across her belly in the film.

Meanwhile, in the real world, a swipe suddenly runs across Nicole’s belly, mimicking what is happening within the movie.

“What’s… what’s happening to me?!” Jasmine screams as something pushes outward against her belly button, slowly reaching further outward. “AHH!!!!”

A sickening noise is heard right at Nicole slams her thumb on the TV’s power button.

“That’s… that’s enough for…” Nicole trails off as something within her pushes outward at her belly button, before falling back in. It quickly kicked the same spot, reaching even farther. “Ooh… I regret this movie…” She grunts as another one of the aliens starts to stretch outward in another spot.

“M-Mom…?” Alissa stares down at her mother’s belly as the third alien starts to squirm, leaving Nicole’s belly a deformed blob for the time being.

“It’s okay, Alissa… but… my back is killing me…” Nicole groans in discomfort. “Hey, Alissa…”

“Y-Yes, mom?”

“Whenever you have kids, don’t be pregnant with more than one… hoo… hoo…” Nicole breathes.

“Mom… are you… are you in labor?”

“No, just pregnant is all… having a big belly like this isn’t the most comfortable…” Nicole rubs her belly, which looks to be fully alive on its own.
15132221111121112.title: Something catches their attention during the movie

151322211111212.content:
Alissa quickly withdrew her hand from her mother's swollen abdomen when she felt something moving inside. She crossed to the houses phone (her mobile needed credit),"something is going on I going to call the hospital."

Nicole knew something was terribly wrong with her, she had just cleared the kitchen out of food and her belly had swollen to the size and weight of a medicine ball, but the hormones flooding through her rapidly growing body were telling her one thing, no one could hurt her…belly, Nicole wasn’t sure what was going on in her distended abdomen but she knew it was important that no one could disturbed it, especially doctors or scientists as they would hurt her…belly. Again Nicole knew something was going inside but she did not know what, all her body was telling her to do was to eat and no one could disturb her…belly.
She put her hand down on the receiver of the phone Alissa went to pick it up, “No!,” she said with more force then she intended. “I mean, just give it some time,” Nicole said in a kinder tone, “it probably will be gone soon, just pretend it is always been here.”

Alissa eyed the bowling ball bulge of her mother's belly, “O K,” she said slowly, and unconsciously backing away. Something was clearly going on with her mother not just her body but in her mind but she didn’t want to cause an outburst or a scene, and beside maybe it will be gone by tomorrow.
It was at that point there was a knock at the door Alissa opened to reveal…
151322211111212.title: She feels the shape of something in her mother&...

choices: Her belly had also grown, though not as much as Nicole’s
She was oddly subservient and eager to help Nicole.
1513222111112121.content: Alissa open the door to reveal her friend Christine, she quickly found something was wrong with her…
1513222111112121.title: Christine, Alissa petite blonde friend

choices: Nicole says yes, and lets Christine do the shopping for her
Nicole says no, and insists on doing the shopping herself
15132221111121212.content:
Alissa perked up upon seeing her friend, "Christine, I thought you weren't feeling welling?" she asked.
"I know but I started feeling better and couldn't help but think but be here," replied the blonde haired girl.
"So what do you want to do?"
"Could I come inside," replied Christine.
'Strange,' thought Alissa to herself normally 'she doesn't want to come inside,' in fact, she normally just beeped her car horn when she arrived. Alissa then thought about her mother and her new swollen belly, while Nicole seemed rather unphased by it considering her belly had just inflated like an especially large party balloon, but Alissa still was incredibly worried about it and didn't want her friend seeing her mother now that she looked ready to pop with triplets, her belly almost on full display. "Just a second," she said closing the door and running to find her mother.

Alissa managed to find Nicole as she was just about enter the kitchen possibly to make another look around for food. "Mom can you go up stairs?" Alissa didn't wait for answer and swivelled Nicole around and started pushing her towards the stairs. It took more effort then she first though but this was to be expected she told herself as her mother looked like she weighed significantly more than she normally did.
"Why?" asked Nicole as she was directed towards the stair case.
"Because Christine is here and I don't want her to see you in your pyjamas, this was partly true but Alissa didn't want to say the main reason, being Nicole's belly as she seemed awfully touchy about it.

After Nicole had ascended the stair case Alissa went to the front door and opened it, her friend was straight past her before Alissa said anything, in fact Alissa had to move aside so Christine didn't walk through her. "Did you bring my shoe? asked Alissa as she closed the door.
"Yeah it is my car," Christine said off handedly. Alissa wonder why she hadn't brought in with her but quickly became alarmed when she saw Christine making her way to the stair case.
"No no no no no no," she said dragging her friend to the couch and forcing her down, "why don't you take a seat her and we can talk about last night."
"I feel I should be up..." started Christine in the vague voice that Alissa was only now starting to pick up on.
"Did you hook up with anyone last night," she interrupted only to be interrupted herself by some footsteps coming down the stairs, she groaned knowing it was her mother and turned to see she was right and her mother was ponderously making her way down the stairs.

Nicole had at least changed out of her pyjamas and was now wearing a green sweater which, whilst covered mover of her, only came down to just above her navel, and a pair of jeans. It has been noted before that Nicole hips were quite wide in proportion to her body, this meant many of pants and jeans were quite baggy in the seat as she didn't have the bottom to fill them, and they were still slightly baggy there but not as much as there once were.

Alissa went to say something to try and explain the appearance of her mother but Christine had already gotten up and crossed over to Nicole and started to fuss over her, "oh my you are simply huge, you must be so worn out," she said rubbing the swollen mass of her Nicole's belly. Alissa was nonplussed, Christine had never shown this kind of interest in a pregnant woman (the only thing she could confused her mother with) before and always referred to her mother as Ms Sterling but now. "You shouldn't be moving around in your state, let me help you."
Nicole wordlessly accepted and then Christine, despite being two-thirds the height and probably a third of the weight of Nicole, helped her down the last step and over to the couch where she help lower her down on to it before sitting next to her.

Alissa watched completely confused and ignored as Christine rubbed her mother's belly and ask Nicole questions, who only slightly confused why her daughter's best friend was so interested in her.
"How have you been holding up?" asked Christine.
"Ok, but my clothes are have trouble fitting me," Nicole replied gesturing to her sweater's hemline.
"Just move of your beautiful form to see," said Christine beginning the belly rubbing again. Alissa watched as her mother was some what taken a back by this and blush at Christine's statement.
"Have you been getting enough to eat?" Christine asked.
"Definitely, I cleaned out the kitchen and was about to go out and buy some more food."
"What!?" exclaimed Christine standing up, "you can't be moving about in your condition, let me go shopping for you."
Nicole hesitated then said...
15132221111121212.title: She was oddly subservient and eager to help Nic...

151322211111212121.content:
"No I don't really thi..." began Nicole struggling to her feet, still not used to her new size and weight.
"Don't worry," said Christine calmly gently pressing Nicole back down onto the couch, "It will be no problem at all," she continued.
"But you don't know what to get?" said Nicole.
"Oh I know what to get," said Christine, placing her hand on the bare skin of Alissa's mother's belly and gently rubbing it.

Alissa watched this increasingly bizarre situation, her mouth open in shock. Christine was her best friend from high school, Alissa couldn't remember much from last night but from what she could remember included Christine partying, drinking and making out with guys as much someone would expect from a near graduated teenage girl and now she was fawning over Nicole's mysteriously swollen belly with awe and increasingly, to Alissa horror, attraction.

"But you don't what food to buy," said Nicole in one last attempt to resist.
"I think we both know the answer to that," said Christine in an almost sensual whisper, her hand making it's way to Nicole protruding navel and giving it a flirtatious pluck.
This caused Nicole's entire body to shudder, "Ok," she said breathily.
"I'll see you soon," said Christine making her way to the front door.

Alissa needed answers so she decided to...
151322211111212121.title: Nicole says yes (eventually)

1513222111112121212.content:
Alissa, left speechless, turned to her mother, who noticed her discomfort with the recent development.

"Uh...mom?" Alissa managed to spit out.

"Y-Yes dear?" Her mother replied shakily, still a bit flustered from Christine's unusually...touchy behavior.

"What the hell was that all about?" Alissa's inquiry only served to further redden her mother's already blushing face.

"Now Alissa, just because your friend may have been a bit...affectionate-"

"Affectionate?!?" Alissa scoffed, "Mom, she was literally feeling your belly up and checking you out!"

"W-Well I..." Nicole didn't know what to say to that, and couldn't suppress a shiver of pleasure as she remembered how...right Christine's hands had felt when she'd placed them on her gravid belly. It had almost felt like whatever was in her womb had even calmed down just from her touch, since Nicole noticed that after Christine had left that her passengers had started acting up once again. "I think I just want to rest right now honey..." Nicole huffed, lying back on her bed and turning her back to her daughter.

"Well...alright mom," Alissa sighed, shaking her head, "just...be careful okay?" The only response she got was a snore that emanated from her mother. "Wow, she passed out quick." With one last look at her sleeping, pregnant mother, she closed the door to her mother's room and decided to simply take a nap in her own room.

On Nicole's end, she sighed in relief as she heard her daughter take the bait and leave after her fake snoring. However, a lot of the questions her daughter raised were things she was wondering herself. Why couldn't they remember the night of the party? How was she suddenly so pregnant? Why was Christine acting this way towards her? Most of all however...

"Why am I feeling this way about her?" Nicole muttered, "I haven't felt this way towards anyone since Alissa's father..."

"Felt what way?" Nicole gasped, and looked up to see none other than Christine, holding about five bags of groceries.

"C-Christine!" Nicole stuttered, "I um...I didn't-"

"Sh-sh-sh, it's okay!" Christine shushed Nicole with a finger on her lips, before giving her a flirtatious look, "I think I might know what you're feeling, however, just in case I'm wrong..." Christine paused, and set the groceries down before sauntering over to Nicole and leaned towards her.

"C-Christine wha-Mmph!" Nicole was silenced as she suddenly found herself being kissed by her own daughter's best friend. Her mind screamed at her to do something, anything, and that the current situation was completely wrong by all accounts. However, for some reason, she just couldn't muster the will to break the kiss, and soon simply accepted and fully returned the kiss with renewed passion.

After what felt like an eternity, the two women broke their lip-lock, panting feverishly and staring at each other in a new light.

"Well?" Christine giggled, "Was I right in my answer?" Nicole, still in shock from what had just happened, nodded dumbly. "Good!" Christine chirped.

"H-Hang on!" Nicole shook her head, "just what is going on Christine? Have you always felt this way towards me or..."

"Not since yesterday," Christine answered with a shrug.

"What changed?"

"Well, tell me how this feels first off?" Christine placed a hand on Nicole's belly, and began to gently rub her hand along its surface, making her breath catch and Nicole shudder once more.

"It feels...amazing..." Nicole whispered.

"That's because the children know their father's presence." Nicole's head snapped up at that.

"Wait, what? Their father? How are you...that's not possible!"

"Well, this human body wasn't the original progenitor persay," Christine chuckled, "but my mind is currently housed within her, and the children can feel it."

"O-oh..." Nicole remained silent for a few moments before speaking once more, "so what do you plan to do?"

"Well, unfortunately, even though you proved to be one of the most prime carriers for our next generation, it's still not enough." Christine's face hardened into a look of frustration, "we just might need your daughter to carry some of our young-"

"No!" Nicole replied sternly, "making me carry your children is fine, I'm used to it, but not Alissa! She's already scared enough as it is! She doesn't need some alien's creatures within her making her more stressed out!"

"I beg to differ my dear Nicole," Christine shot back, "you've already seen how calmly our young behave when I'm around, and how you felt towards me. Alissa would be the same case, and not only that, this would bring you even closer together as mother and daughter, which is something you've wanted for a long time, am I correct?"

"W-Well..." Nicole tried to argue, but couldn't deny that she was right on all points, "still...I just..."

"Please Nicole," Christine whispered, kissing her once again, "just trust me!"

"W-Well..." Nicole looked down, before replying...
1513222111112121212.title: Stay with her mother...

choices: Nicole had another hunger attack on the way to the shops
Nicole didn't have another hunger attack on the way to the shops
151322211112.content:
Alissa sat in her car in the driveway for a bit as the last of her hang over ebbed away. She was happy to be out of the house and away from her mother, the drab woman that she was always working and worrying and never having any fun. Nicole had been a variety of secretarial and administration jobs since before Alissa was born, currently she was employed by the local tv station. Alissa pulled out of the driveway and made her where to Christine's place, she switched on the radio just in time to catch the last couple of horoscopes.
"...expect to find love in your life if you play your cards right, Virgo; Big changes are coming your way so prepare for the unexpected, Libra; You may find your life turned upside down in coming week but it won't be forever. That is all of your news from the stars back to you Roy," finished the psychic in her breathy voice.
"Thanks, Julie," said the DJ, "If you're interested in that you may interested in hearing that last night there were over a dozen reported UFO sighting within the state making it the highest number on record since 1972, the government has issued a statement saying 'it will look into as many as these reports as possible but does not expect to find anything', what do you think Lisa?" said the DJ directing the question to his co-host.
"It was prom night for many schools in the are last night, sounds like a few people were hitting the 'fruit punch' a little too hard," said Lisa before continuing, "so in honour of all you kooks out there, we're now playing Sneaky Sound System's 'UFO', followed by David Bowie's 'Starman', you're listening to Roy and Lisa's Midday Madness brought to you by, Palvo's Dairy."
Alissa turned off the radio as the opening note to the song began, 'Life turned upside down in the coming week,' she thought to herself, no surprises there she was graduating in a few days, her mother was a Virgo and Alissa was planning to move out as soon as possible after graduating, so that was probably the big change.

Back out the house Nicole had finished off the last of the food and getting ready to head out to restock the fridge, she couldn't believe how much she ate. She really couldn't, she kept telling herself things like 'there was less food than she thought to begin with,' or 'that most of the packets or food were nearly empty to begin with.' Nicole knew she had eaten a lot, more than anyone thought possible, and it showed, a significant swell in her lower abdomen now bulged over her jeans that she had put on and her button up shirt she had put on was straining to cover it. Nicole had no idea what had gotten into to make eat so much, whatever it was she hoped it didn't happen again.
151322211112.title: Follow Alissa

1513222111122.content:
Christine was short, bespectacled and demure, though in the last year or so Alissa had some success opening her up. Christine’s features were a blend of her Korean mother’s and American father’s, both were quite conservative. This was probably why Christine was less out going then most girls her age and why she was one of the few people in her and Alissa’s grade that actually wore a proper school uniform, even Nicole let Alissa get away with only wearing the uniform’s shirt leaving Alissa to choose what else to wear with it. Though through teenage rebellion and encouragement by Alissa, Christine began making some bolder decisions, in a way. She developed a taste for heavy metal music, which Alissa herself wasn’t particularly fond of and Christine’s parents were certainly not pleased with and whilst she was allowed to put band poster up in her room she couldn’t listen to the music without headphones, something that Christine assured Alissa ruined the experience.

When Alissa knocked at the door it was answered by her Christine’s mother, who automatically said “she’s upstairs with her headphones on listening to that ungodly racket.”
“Thanks Mrs Allen,” said Alissa making her way to the staircase.
“Who is it?” a newspaper in the livingroom appeared to ask.
“It’s Christine’s friend Alissa, dear,” replied Mrs Allen.
“Tell her that she’s upstairs with her headphones on listening to that ungodly racket,” said Mr Allen turning a page to the newspaper that was concealing his upper body.
“I already have dear.”

After knocking on Christine’s door twice with no answer, Alissa opened the door to reveal her friend was indeed at her computer, leaning back in her desk chair, with her eyes closed and headphones on. Alissa tapped her on the shoulder causing Christine to jolt which unplugged her headphones from her computer. There was a brief sound of a couple of guitars and a drum kit being tortured before Christine hastily turned it off. “Alissa you should texted me to let me know when you’d be here.”
“I did,” said Alissa smiling and sitting on the edge of Christine’s bed.
Christine looked at her phone and the three unread message on it, “Oh.”
The petite girl now automatically sat with her legs together with her hands clasped on her lap, the image contrasted greatly with her room, with its pastel pink walls mostly covered by dark band posters and her black quilt cover with a skull motif, making it looked like she was sitting in the room of an older sibling rather than her own.
Christine produced Alissa’s shoe from behind her chair, “How did you get home without it?”
“Honestly, I was so wasted I hardly remember anything since we arrived at Jessie’s after the prom.”
“You looked that way,” did you hear what happened to Paul?”
“Only bits and pieces,” said Alissa, “Weren’t the police called in?”
“That’s what I heard.”
“What about you and Lee?” asked Alissa.
Christine blushed and looked down, “You remember that?”
“Hard not to, you two were inseparable all night,” said Alissa laughing before asking in a whisper, “So you did you two do it?”
“What?! No,” said Christine shocked, Alissa shook her head even when drunk as a skunk Christine still followed her parent’s ethics.

There was a beep from Christine’s computer, letting her know that she had an email, she swivelled round to see what it was, “It’s just a daily newsletter on local news,” she said dismissively, “I’m sure there’s nothing…oh no.”
“What is it?” asked Alissa craning to see what it was, “nothing to with what happened with Pau…oh that,” as she saw a headline mentioning the high number sightings of flying saucers last night.
That was another thing about Christine she had this strange interest in aliens, she didn’t go out looking for it, Alissa wasn’t sure if Christine owned a telescope, it was like part of her knew that aliens didn’t exist but every time there was a sighting or a story about a crop circles it was all Christine could talk about. She once asked her father if he could take her to see area 51 but was disappointed when he said “he wasn’t in that part of the military,” before adding rather lamely, “not that the place exists.”

“I can’t believe it, the highest number of sightings in one night in my lifetime and was too drunk to notice,” said Christine.
“The people who did see them probably were drunk too,” said Alissa stopping short of actually saying aliens don’t exist, she had argued with Christine about it once before and didn’t want to do it again.
“Who knows if they’ll be back,” said Christine wistfully looking out a gap in her curtains at the sky.
Alissa decided to change to topic, “Are you ready for our summer trip?”
“Nearly, I still need a swimsuit,” replied Christine tearing her gaze back inside.
“Christine we’re going to Florida, you going to need at least three,” said Alissa picking up her things, it was going to be tough to find a swimsuit that looked good on Christine as her friend lacked any curve what so ever, but Alissa the challenge was going to be half the fun, “come on lets go get you some, I’ll drive.”
1513222111122.title: Alissa visits Christine

15132221111222.content:
Meanwhile at the same mall Alissa and Christine were planning on to, Nicole was just going through checkout of one of the supermarkets.

“Doing the fortnightly groceries?” asked the cashier, a person clearly always up for a chat unfortunately for them though Nicole had other things on her mind.
“Yes,” Nicole said nodding, beneath a tautly button shirt her bloated belly groaned.
“Certainly a lot ice cream here,” continued the cashier scanning a tub of the stuff.
Nicole just gave nod this time, ever since she arrived at the shops Nicole had been trying to contain a building hunger whilst her had been trying to contain a growing belly.
She started shopping by just replenishing the food needed including the cereal to what she ate earlier but as time passed she started putting more and more into the shopping trolley as her hunger built, by the time she passed the ice cream she was ravenous and piled a dozen of the tubs into the trolley without regard to brand or flavour. It was strange as she still felt stuffed from breakfast and her taut stomach occasionally groaned in discomfort, but somehow she was also incredibly hungry and needed to eat. Every item she passed called out to her and body demanded to consume it. Even now it took every bit of self-control she had not to tear open the packets and start eating now.
“That will be $384.95,” said the cashier, Nicole produced her card wordlessly. “Do you have a Sho…” began the cashier.
“No!” snapped Nicole much more harshly than she intended.
“Just swipe or tap your card,” said the cashier slightly taken aback.
Nicole finished the transaction as the cashier loaded the bags into the trolley.
“Thank you,” said Nicole in an attempt to make up for her tone before, but she didn’t wait for a reply.

Nicole pushed the trolley across mall towards the doors leading out as fast as she could, she was nearly there all had to do was get to the car and then she could start eating, all she needed to do was hold on for another couple of minutes. But between her and the doors was the food court and as she passed through the concoctions of aromas stopped her in her tracks, her belly moaned as her unbeknown brood demanded sustenance, she needed food NOW!

She turned to the nearest food outlet without a queue, a burger joint named ‘BurgerTreat’ and headed to counter. The employee behind the counter, a young headed woman, took an unconscious step back as Nicole barrelled down on her, grabbing the counter with both hands letting the trolley veer off hitting a table nearby.
“Welcome to BurgerTre…” began the employee.
“Give me food,” barked Nicole as her extra-terrestrial unborn screamed at her to eat.
“What food would you like,” said employee somewhat perplexed.
Nicole scanned the menu above the counter before pointing at the picture of the biggest thing she could see, “That.”
“An Ultimate Burger Meal Dealtm?”
“No two,” said Nicole before clutching at her belly which groaned louder than ever.
“Are you ok ma’am?” asked the employee touching Nicole’s arm.
“Yes, just need food,” said Nicole.
“Ok…so two Ultimate Burger Meal Dealstm?”
Nicole’s belly groaned again, the bottom button popped of her shirt with a 'ping' revealing the lower curve of her swelling abdomen, “More.”
15132221111222.title: Follow Nicole

151322211112221.content:
When Alissa and Christine enter the mall they noticed there was small ring of people around one of outlets in the food court, many had their phones out and were taking pictures or videos of something.

“Why are there so many people around BurgerTreat?” asked Christine, “It’s not even the best burger place in the food court.”
“Maybe there’s a celebrity like an actor or singer dining there,” said Alissa drawing out her own phone in preparation.
“Are you sure,” said Christine doubtfully following, “which celebrity would go to burger treat?”
The pair pressed their way into the ring of people and were shocked to see the sight that met their eyes.
It was Nicole, Alissa’s mother, but something seemed strange about her, several things really.

Firstly she was eating like there was no tomorrow, seeming to shove entire burgers into her mouth. Alissa didn’t know how long Nicole had been there but guessing by the remains of numerous food packets that surrounded her it was probably quite some time but then again given the speed Nicole was consuming food at maybe it wasn’t that long.
The other strange thing were the changes in Nicole’s physique, these changes were partly due to the sheer amount food she consumed and the other reason unbeknown to anyone (including Nicole herself) was changes her body was making to carry the interstellar brood developing within her.

Nicole’s hips, already larger than usual had widen since Alissa last saw them, and she now had a vast backside to match, with each perky cheek noticeably curving from her frame like a pair of volleyballs and were straining the fabric of her pants.

More concerning to Alissa (and Nicole had she not been so focused on eating several time her own ever increasing body weight) was Nicole’s belly. All but the top few buttons had burst open on her shirt and the orb of flesh the size of an over inflated basket ball that was Nicole’s belly was on complete display. The skin of her bulging abdomen was paler that the rest of her body and whilst Nicole’s clothes were stained with sauce, mustard and other condiments, her belly (along the rest of her body) was clear of such things, though a thin layer of grease coated her belly giving it a reflective sheen. Alissa overheard people in the crowd saying Nicole’s belly seemed to be visibly growing, and to Alissa's mind it also appeared to be growing before her eyes. Though she wasn’t sure as her mother’s bulging abdomen churned as Nicole forced more and more food inside herself, one thing that Alissa clearly saw however was Nicole’s belly button go from an innie to a proud and prominent outie with an audible ‘Pop!’

Alissa looked around in embarrassment at the crowd who were staring in silent amazement at Nicole’s feast. Christine was also silently staring at Nicole like the rest of the crowd with the same look of shock and awe as the rest of the small crowd but Alissa didn’t pick up on the additional desire and wonder in her friend’s eyes as Christine gazed at Nicole’s swollen middle with its now protruding nub of a belly button.

Nicole seemed oblivious to her surroundings, including the crowd of people, as she drained a jumbo sized drink in a matter of second and gave large belch before giving a stretch causing her chest to stick out prominently showing a pair of swollen breasts, noticeably larger than Alissa remembered, straining the remaining few buttons on Nicole’s shirt, with one the button pooping off and giving a glimpse to a lacy black bra that was not fairing much better than the shirt in containing Nicole’s increasingly ample bosom. Nicole found burger within the pile of cups and containers that covered the table, she leaned back in her seat and took a bite out of the burger not bothering to unwrap it first. As she did this one hand absentmindedly reached down and undid the button on her pants, there seemed to be a sigh of relief that came from Nicole’s body as the pants were undone and despite not being restricted by them Nicole’s belly bulged out even further.

Alissa couldn’t bear it any longer and signalled to Christine to leave.
“Wha…?” said Christine dreamily
“I said lets go,” said Alissa grabbing her friend’s hand and dragging her towards the clothing shops.
“But I…want…” started Christine feebly before complying and accompanying Alissa.

About half an hour after the two left Nicole was still eating but she pretty much ran out of food from the several orders she made, she wasn’t how many burger meals she ate as she lost count after twenty. The cashier who had served her earlier came up to Nicole looking down at the seated older woman with a look that was mixture of concern and disgust “Are you alright ma’am?”
Nicole’s gut answered first as it gave a bubbling groan followed by Nicole belching in the face of cashier who wrinkled her nose. Starting to become aware to her surroundings Nicole blushed in embarrassment, “Sorry, no I am fine just a littl…ooof,” she said. Nicole’s hands flew to her swollen stomach and she gave a loud gutful groan as her digestive system let her know that it couldn’t handle more than a month’s worth of food for an entire family in one sitting and made its discomfort known in full. “UUUUGGHH! I’m just... so full,” she said as her innards felt like they were close to bursting open.
“Do you want me to call an ambulance?” said the cashier.
“No!," fear sweeping over her as she began to realise what she had done, "I just need to ‘oooooh’ get home,” said Nicole getting to her feet ungainly not used to her new weight.
Everyone in the small crowd watched still in complete silence as Nicole waddle to her trolley still filled with food and using her now substantial weight to push it, walked towards the exit all the while with Nicole moaning and her belly groaning.

As the cashier watched the lumbering figure leave, she said under her breath “was her ass always that big?” referring to Nicole’s increasingly generous rear. Just then the cashier’s own stomach gave a rumble a wave of hunger swept over her.
151322211112221.title: Follow Alissa

1513222111122212.content:
“I can’t believe her,” said Alissa as she and Christine picked through the different swimming clothes, “It’s like she was trying to embarrass me on purpose.”
“I don’t think those people knew that she was your mom,” said Christine putting an item of clothing into the basket she was carrying. She wondered whether to point out that what they just witness was more of a concern for Nicole’s health rather than Alissa public image.
Alissa looked at what Christine had selected before tossing it back on the rack, “I mean couldn’t she gorge herself silly in a few weeks when I have moved out.”
“She did look very…,” Christine paused for a moment trying to find the right word while she mimed Nicole’s enormous belly “…bloated,” she finished.
While she had said it in an effort to tactfully remind Alissa that there were some things more important than her ego, just thinking about Nicole’s swollen abdomen gave Christine a warm feeling in her and a tingling in her fingers and toes.
“I know she really le…”Alissa started angrily before saying, “didn’t look like that this morning.”

The two were nearly at the changing rooms, “she looked ready to give birth,” said Christine blushing.
“You’re not suggesting that she’s pregnant,” said Alissa the anger now completely gone from her voice replaced by confusion, “This isn’t one of your alien conspiracies, she hasn’t been knocked up by aliens.”
The thought hadn’t originally crossed Christine’s mind but now that it was mentioned it seemed clear, “if she looked normal this morning and now looks like,” she again mimed having Nicole’s belly, this time looking at herself in the mirror and imaging herself with a belly that big, “that’s not usual.”
“There’s got be a perfectly normal explanation for it…there’s got to be, I’ll ask her about it this evening,” said Alissa. Unlike Christine, Alissa didn’t want to think about her mother’s massive middle and wanted to drop the topic, she grabbed an item out of the basket at random and gave it to Christine, “Now try this on.”
1513222111122212.title: Follow someone else

15132221111222122.content:
Nicole hadn’t gone home in the end once she had loaded up the groceries and got in the car “(after moving the driver’s seat back to she could fit) she decided to go to the doctor’s instead. Something was wrong with her and she needed to find out what.

She now sat in the doctor's waiting room somewhat embarrassed by the fact the lower buttons on her shirt could not be done up giving the world a view of the swollen mass of her belly, her stomachache had subsided but her belly still throbbed dully constantly reminding her of the inordinate amount of food she had consumed. Nicole couldn't sit still, she occasionally tugged at her shirt in the vain hope that it had become larger and could be done up, her pants, already a problem due her large hips, were stretched to their limit in an effort to cover her also growing rear.

Nicole was so preoccupied with her clothing that she was shock when she felt a hand on her belly, she turned to see the old lady sitting next to her, who had reached out and was now rubbing Nicole's swollen lower abdomen. "Not far off hey dear?” she said.
“What? No?!” said Nicole instinctively recoiling away as best she could.
The old lady who looked fifteen years Nicole’s senior, though good for her age, looked surprised at her response said, “No need to be upset, I’m here with my one of mine who is expecting her first, but she insists I wait out here as she wants the gender to be a surprise but everyone in my family has started off with a girl, last check up the general doctor, I must say she left it a bit late for her first child but better late than never,” rambled the woman before asking, “this isn’t your first is it?”
Nicole didn’t want say it was her second because she was still hoping that the doctor would tell that her swollen stomach was just a retention of water or a build-up of gas and would give her something for it that would make it go away as fast as it came, but she didn’t want to argue the fact with this woman especially given the way Nicole appeared. “I have a teenage daughter,” she said, deciding on a technical truth.
“Looking forward to becoming a big sister is she?”
Nicole was then froze in fear, she was not aware that Alissa had seen her like this, not since she had balloon up, how would she react, again Nicole hoped again the doctor would be able to help her so she had an explanation for her daughter.

Nicole cast around in her mind for a technically true answer to tell the old lady when the door to the doctor’s office open and a dark hair beaming woman in her mid 30s came out. The old lady stood up and made her way over her daughter and asking, “Everything ok Jacinta?”
“Of course” the daughter nodded her name and complexion giving away her and her mother’s Mediterranean ancestry, she looked at Nicole. The old lady went to help Nicole up, who wave it away as politely as she could, she did want act as though she was pregnant in the hope that this would help her not look pregnant, but as she heaved herself to her feet Nicole felt that it made no difference.

“Jacinta this is…” the old woman began saying, “Where are my manners I didn’t get you name?”
“Nicole,” panted Nicole still winded from standing up.
“and I am Rosemary and this is my daughter Jacinta who as you can see is expecting as well,” said Rosemary as though Jacinta’s pregnancy needed announcing again
Nicole cringed internally as Rosemary described her as ‘expecting’, Jacinta practically rushed forward until her rounded belly, that was covered by a long dress was touching Nicole’s exposed one. “Look at you,” Jacinta said, “so far along and with twins?” Nicole would have stepped back were the bank of chairs not been right behind her. Nicole wondered how big she must really look for Jacinta to ask that, but she was distracted by another concern. Though it was difficult to tell from this angle and especially as Jacinta’s belly was covered but as far as Nicole could tell Jacinta was only a week or so from being full term and as far as she could see Nicole’s own belly seemed to be the bigger of the two.
Nicole sort for a response that would return the compliment to Jacinta that would also allow Nicole to extricate herself from touching bellies, but just then Nicole’s belly gave an audible gurgle and a second later Nicole loudly burped in the face of the two women, “I’m so sorry,” said Nicole hoping now more than ever for a reason to leave.

Her hopes were answered as the doctor appeared in the doorway to her office and called Nicole’s name out. “It was nice to meet you both,” she said before making her way to the doctor, she felt the eyes of the other two women on her as she tried not to let her walk become a waddle.

After the door snapped shut behind Nicole, Rosemary said, “Did you see the culo on her,” referring to Nicole increasingly generous behind.
“Mother!” scoffed Jacinta at the fact her mother even knew such a word little lone use it, before putting a hand on her belly, “let’s get something to eat on the way home.”
“But we stopped for food on the way in,” replied her mother but Rosemary too now also felt surprisingly hungry.
15132221111222122.title: Follow Nicole

151322211112221222.content:
The store manager of BurgerTreat was taking stock, he’d arrived at the store just under an hour ago only to be told that were running dangerously low on several items. He’d found this difficult to believe as they had just received their shipment this morning and assumed that someone had just misplaced them. But he couldn’t find either and all the staff had been saying that woman had come in and ate it all. The store manager knew that it was impossible for one person to eat all that food in one go, not without them bursting and leaving bits littering the surrounding food court; no doubt someone was stealing supplies, and the store manager had made a note to check the security cameras later.
He was checking the freezer in the back when Peter, the greasy teen who manned the equally greasy fry machine came up to him.
“Uh sir, we have problem.”
“Don’t tell me,” began the store manager sarcastically, “the woman is back and has taken more of our supplies?”
“Uh um err,” stuttered Peter who was not trained with dealing with this much sarcasm, “No it’s Samantha, she um uh, you better come and take a look for yourself.”

The two came up to the sundae machine where Samantha the twenty something red haired woman who had served Nicole earlier now with her head under the nozzle of the soft serve machine and was pouring a constant stream of artificial dairy product into her mouth. The store manager watched in silence as short woman with a few strands of hair escaping her bun whilst engaged in tablo that looked like it belonged in a cartoon. “I saved her burning herself as she was trying to eat handfuls of fries straight from the trough,” said the greasy youth as though the company awarded medals for such acts.
The store manager gave a vague grunt as he thought, Samantha had only applied for the job to help pay her way through college and was quite against the food sold a BurgerTreat, to the stage where the store manager had received complaints from several employees and even a couple customers that Samantha had lectured and chastised them about the food they were eating and how it was bad for their health.
The store manager wasn’t sure how long she had been there for but given the way her shirt had pulled back unable to cover a bloated and taut belly that made Samantha look like she was 20 weeks pregnant it had to be for some time. “What do you want me to do?” asked Peter, “I tried to stop her, but she pushed me away, I could unplug the machine if you want?”
The store manager gave a vindictive grin, “let her finish then ask her to pay for what she’s had.”
151322211112221222.title: Follow someone else

1513222111122212222.content:
Vanessa Porter was not a maternity specialist but the general practitioner, Nicole knew she couldn’t be pregnant and despite her body’s rapid changes thought it must be caused something else.
The doctor was looking over a file when Nicole lumbered into the room, “Miss Sterling, I saw you only a few months ago, you shouldn’t need another appoi…” she trailed off when she looked up and saw Nicole easing herself into a chair.

“Well when did this ha…” began Dr Porter.
“I know what it looks like but that’s not the case,” interrupted Nicole.
“Tell me what’s happening,” said the doctor a lot more interested than she was when Nicole waddled in.
“Well this morning I woke up and I was normal except for feeling queasy then this happened,” said Nicole gesturing at her swollen abdomen.
“There is a lot of things that can cause bloating, though this seems to be very extreme, what having you be eating lately.”
“Recently everything, at times I barely can control myself,” said Nicole.
“Like a craving?” asked the doctor.
“No, I just become famished and I start eating and don’t stop until I feel I am ready to explode and then I keep eating,” said Nicole before continuing in a more hushed tone as though admitting to something, “the first time I ate all the food in the kitchen, there was enough to last me and my daughter a week, I ate in one sitting, by myself. And that was only the beginning I later went shopping to restock the food I had eaten and before I could leave the shops I felt hungry again and order and consumed a dozen burger meals, I ate all of them. It was all I could do not to each the groceries I just purchased, my brain was telling me to stop but my kept telling me to eat.”
Nicole finished her list, “uh huh,” said Vanessa Porter, clearly not believing Nicole, “that seems a bit unbelievable.”
“I know didn’t think anyone could eat that much.”
“Have you noticed any other changes?” asked Vanessa and nodded towards Nicole’s engorged breasts.
“Well yes…but it’s not like that,” said an increasingly flustered Nicole.
“Of course not,” the doctor without really meaning it while marking something off on her clipboard.
“But I can’t be though,” bemoaned Nicole, “I haven’t had sex in over a year,” she added.
“I know this is troubling to you, but can I get you to stand so I can examine your…you,” said Dr Porter.

Nicole heaved herself clumsily to her feet and the doctor produced a measuring tape slung it around Nicole. For a second Nicole was afraid that it wouldn’t reach around her, but it did and Vansessa wrote something on her clipboard which Nicole couldn’t see; The doctor bent down and place a stethoscope on Nicole’s stomach and start to examine it.
Nicole felt increasing self-conscious as Dr Porter examined her swollen abdomen, the doctor’s cold hands seemed incredibly small against the mass of her belly. The belly itself kept groaning and bubbling as though something was brewing inside it, what was worst is seemed to be getting louder.
When she had finish measuring and listening to Nicole’s bulging stomach she straightened up and said, “I’m going to ask y…”
“URRRPP!” for the third time that day Nicole loudly belched in the face of someone, “I’m sorry,” in a voice that seemed like a whisper after the volume of the burp.
The doctor waved it away and continued, “Could you please stand on the scale,” she said gesturing to the scale in question.

Nicole tentatively hopped on the scales which felt awfully fragile under her, Dr Porter crouched down to write down the wait as Nicole was unable to see it through her protruding belly. “one…one… seven point eight,” said the doctor as she wrote down the weight on her clipboard.
Nicole inadvertently stepped off the scales, this information shocked her the most, while she didn’t weigh herself regularly she didn’t yo-yo diet, so if she weighed 117.8kg that would mean she would gain over 45kg since she last checked her weight, most of it in the past few days, the cold hard fact that she now weighed more than she ever had in her life that drilled home the fact how much her body has changed, and changed it had.

Her spherical looking belly looked like the textbook definition of pregnancy though larger, whilst her pants which normally saggy in the seat, as Nicole often had to buy a size up to fit her hips, were now stretched to tearing point as they tried to contain the growing mounds of flesh that were Nicole’s butt cheeks, and her breasts felt imprisoned by her bra. It was strange that she gained weight exclusively in these places, her arms and legs actually seemed thinner than before, she wasn’t sure if that was really happening or if it was an illusion in comparison to the swelling parts of her body. It was like said body was trying to make itself look as fecund as possible. Meanwhile inside Nicole’s womb a multitude of things floated, attached to their unwitting mother there were several things that set this apart from a normal pregnancy, first was the offspring itself whilst they looked vaguely like an early fetus they also seemed to be tadpole like, the other was the number of them over fifty of the things were attached to Nicole they were sending out signals to their host, making it produce hormones and change. Nicole’s body was being reconfigured to be a ‘baby’ factory, its primary function was now become to grow and contain what was growing inside her womb. Her offspring would need to do a lot more growing and as such Nicole would need to do a lot more growing a whole lot more.

“I know you are sure that you are not pregnant but could you take a test,” said the doctor drawing out pack of pregnancy tests from the bottom draw of her desk and gesturing to the door to her office’s bathroom.
1513222111122212222.title: Follow Someone else

15132221111222122222.content:
Alissa and Christine were back at the latter’s house, Christine was unhappy with what she had (Alissa had pressured her into) purchased. It was a string bikini, Christine was not the kind of person to wear such a revealing piece of clothing, normally going with a swim shirt and board shorts when she went swimming, but as Alissa had said “you don’t go to Florida to cover yourself up.” It didn’t help that said bikini was white with a sparse collection of colourful shapes rather than the black with skulls that Christine had wanted, “It makes me look like a child,” said Christine putting the offending item on her bed and going over to her computer.
“Children don’t wear that kind of swimming clothes,” said Alissa, sitting down on the bed “…or least they shouldn’t,” she added.

“Take a look at this,” said Christine.
Alissa leaned into to look at Christine’s computer expecting to see a swim suit design, but sighed when she saw it was one of Christine’s alien conspiracy websites. The website oozed with late 90s/early 2000s in its design and had a black background and bright green text that was painful on the eye.
“This is not the most accurate website,” said Christine scrolling through the page.
“Not the most accurate?” said Alissa rolling her eyes, “I thought you used the highest quality crack-pot sources on alien encounters.”
Christine either didn’t notice or at least pretended not to, “it does however have this,” she said clicking on menu option saying ‘Mother to the Stars: Alien Pregnancy’
“Seems legit,” said Alissa just as sarcastically as before, “got a colon, only official websites use punctuation like that.”

“Take a listen to this,” said Christine opening up an option, “Susie Daisy,” read Alissa, “because that’s a real name, claims she was abducted by a UFO while on the family farm and later gave birth to a pair of aliens.” Below were a pair of pictures of what was presumably the same redhead woman, the first one had her posing next to a fence, in a flannel shirt and daisy dukes, it seemed so cliched Alissa found herself looking for watermark from a stock photo company. The second photo seemed much more natural with the redheaded woman now looking tired, in a cramped kitchen, wearing a pair of overalls covering a large pregnant belly that suggested twins.
“This proves nothing, it’s just a picture of woman and another picture of similar looking pregnant woman,” said Alissa dismissably, “only the text says it has something to do with aliens, and that could be added to any picture.”

“Ok then,” said Christine going back to the list of options, “let’s go with a one that is harder to explain.”
“Why not start with that one?” asked Alissa.
Christine, again, either didn’t hear her or pretended not to as she click on another link.
“Sofie Hjejle,” read Alissa, unaware if the name was as silly sounding in its native tongue as the last one was, “age 24, a member Swedish national volleyball team, was abducted by aliens when she was vacationing at a cabin in the forest, over the next few days she found herself eating an enormous amount of food, and putting on weight particularly in the belly, making her look extremely pregnant.”
Bellow was a pair of pictures; the first of was of a team photo with an arrow pointing to who Alissa assumed was Sofie, the second was the same player now standing in front of a snow covered log cabin, and wearing a large brown coat, looking even larger as it concealed an unbelievably large belly which if to be believe would be the size of an exercise ball.
“That’s clearly fake,” said Alissa, “she’s probably stuck a blanket up under there.”
Christine scrolled down to reveal a third picture of the same woman, now inside coat off and belly on full display. Alissa was so astounded by the large pale orb that it took her a moment to notice that she was wearing her volleyball playing outfit (or one very much like it) from the first picture, though it now seemed to have trouble fitting over a large pair of breasts and an enormous set of buttocks that she hadn’t had in the first picture.

Alissa was silent for a moment before saying, “Ok, this clearly photo-shopped, look at the way she is standing side on that would make it really easy for someone to morph it, right?” she wasn’t too sure if that was true, but it made sense and was more plausible than the alternative. “Besides we would have heard something about this if it were real, remember how much news there was on octomom and this woman is clearly larger than her.”
15132221111222122222.title: Follow Someone else

151322211112221222221.content:
Christine sighed as though she was trying to teach Alissa something simple, but Alissa wasn’t grasping it. “Time to bring out the big guns,” she said.
“Again why not start with the big guns,” said Alissa, “What’s the point of starting with the small guns?”

Christine ignoring her opened up another option, Alissa saw a picture of an almond skin woman with dark hair next to a partially excavated statue, Christine read out the text herself this time. “Sonakshi Patil 31 a British Archaeologist, who said that one night she was up at Stone Henge when she saw a blinding light and blacked out.”
“Can’t be aliens then,” quipped Alissa, “archaeology means it has to be some old god or curse not aliens.”
Christine continued as though Alissa hadn’t said anything, “Over the next couple of days her body went through some rapid changes which she was fortunate enough to document,” she clicked the play button on the first of what looked like a series of video.

The video show Sonakshi in, what Alissa thought to be, quite a small apartment, the video seemed to be being recorded from a computer (most likely a laptop) on a small yet high table, Sonakshi was visible from the shoulders up and appeared to be checking to see if the computer was recording.
When she was sure it was Sonakshi started, in an English accent, “So tonight’s the night, I’m giving my speech to the speech, among others, to the faculty talk night. I was slightly worried earlier that I may have had to pull out because this morning when I woke up I was sick as a dog, but I’m feeling much better now. I also had trouble with my outfit,” she stepped back to show off her skin tight dark grey dress before continuing, “Not so much with the dress but more with the bra, my umm… well breasts are slightly swollen today, not sure why, but I am planning to see a doctor tomorrow if they haven’t gone back down by then, hopefully they haven’t, well hopefully they haven’t and there are no problems with it, though it would mean I would have to buy some new bras as this is the only one that currently fits and it’s far from comfortable.” She said trying to adjust a strap as she stepped back towards the camera. “So yeah, but otherwise everything is all good and ready for my speech, so fingers crossed and wished me luck.”

The video ended, “yep, that was really convincing,” said Alissa sarcastically, “that contained so much indisputable proof of alien life,” she continued, “surprised the media hasn’t got their hands on it yet.”
“It’s important we go through to full process,” said Christine as she selected the next video in the list.

“So that could have gone better, not the speech, the speech went off really well, except my stomach was growling the whole way through it, no one else could hear it but it quite off putting at times, but not enough to ruin the speech. No it was the reception afterwards, for some reason couldn’t stop eating, I know I was sick this morning I had a particularly large lunch though, but for some reason it was like I hadn’t eaten in days. I was meant to catch up with a lot people but couldn’t tear myself away from the buffet except to sit down at the table to eat, and when someone came up to me I was barely able prevent myself talking with my mouth full. Oh yeah…” she covered her mouth with her hand and reddened as she suddenly remembered something embarrassing. “So when Professor Annie Day, my mentor, came up to congratulate me on my speech I…” she trailed off before continuing, “I burped in her face, like really loudly too, like everyone around me heard and turned to see, my god I was so embarrassed, she must of thought I was some sort of pig,” she said covering her face again remembering the incident. “But yeah when I wasn’t embarrassing myself in front of my superiors I was eating, a lot, and I was eating things I normally wouldn’t have, like am not normally a fan of quiche but tonight I couldn’t get enough of it, and it wasn’t just that, I ate a lot and it shows.” She stood back from the camera, to reveal a significant pooch in her lower belly, that hadn’t been there before, clearly visible under the dress, “And I’m not sticking it out either, I’m really not, see I can stick it out further if I try,” she said demonstrating pushing out the curve of her belly which she ran her hands over. “And that’s not the weirdest part either,” she said stepping back towards the camera, “I’m still hungry, like really hungry, I’m planning on getting some take out delivered, so yeah, hopefully this is just this evening, but I guess we’ll find out in the morning.”

“yeeeah, still not convinced,” said Alissa as the second video ended, “all I see is just a woman with a food baby.” Christine was scrolling down to the third video as Alissa continued “Christine, I know you like to build the suspense, but can’t you show me your ‘indisputable evidence’ if there really is any.”
“Just keep watching,” said Christine as she started the next video.

“So I normally don’t do this many videos in the same day but I really feel that I should show this, you know how I said I’ve been really hungry and was going to get some take out despite eating a lot at the reception, well I did and I order a bit more then I normally would,” she gave nervous laugh, “well not really a lot more, I was just so hungry, what was surprising is I ate it all, there was like a half a dozen family buckets,” she said briefly stepping aside to give a view of the remains of them on the table in the background, before stepping back in front of the camera, “I know it sounds crazy but I did eat it all, I couldn’t believe myself either but look.” She stepped back from the camera to give a better view of her, revealing that what had been a small bulge was now a fully pronounced pregnant belly barely covered by the dress the woman was wearing. “I look like I’m pregnant, which we know can’t be the case,” she quickly added with a nervous laugh, “and it’s all gone into the belly, and the bust, but yeah it’s like real see you can see my belly button protruding,” she said fiddling with the obvious nub clearly visible underneath the material, “and I had an innie before,” she said putting her hands on her hips, “I can feel…movement going on in there,” she said her hands going back to her belly, “again can’t be pregnant, it is probably just digestion going on as I did have a lot to eat as you can clearly see.” She walked back closer to the camera, “but the thing is, I know I sound insane but I am still hungry like hungrier than before, I felt like I was close to bursting before but now I can’t stop thinking about getting more as you can probably hear this,” she prodded her swollen abdomen, “calling out for more, so I’m going to go now and I’ll see you tomorrow and we’ll see how I feel then, bye.”

There was a moment silence before Alissa said, “It’s a prank, like a ‘gotcha video’, the videos are really made months apart and just uploaded at the same to create the illusion of it all happening in one night.”
“She’s not married though,” said Christine, “there was no ring, so who’s the father?”
“Christine you prude people can have babies without being married,” said Alissa exasperated at her friend’s cloistered values. “Like I said before this is a prank, she gets pregnant does a series of videos designed to look like a series of vlog videos from the same night all to get attention or funding or likes and subscribes…” continued Alissa but stopped as Christine started the next video.
151322211112221222221.title: Christine shows her more

1513222111122212222211.content:
“Me again, I mean who else would it be on my vlog,” she gave a nervous laugh.
“She really didn’t get out much did she?” quipped Alissa, Christine ignored her.
“Again I normally don’t do so many in the same day, but I just keep eating, this time I got some take out burger delivered, as I’m…having difficulty… moving,” like the other times she took a step back from the camera but much more ponderously than before, the reason for this quickly became apparent if the woman looked full term before now she looked full term with at least eight, “So yeah, um, I’ve…grown…a lot, I mean like look at me like, move over octomom there’s a new record holder in town," she gave a nervous laugh," again can’t be pregnant,” she quickly added, “Just ‘a lot’ of food churning around inside me,” she said absentmindedly rubbing the taut skin of her belly most of which now on display.
“Which is weird why my breasts are also getting bigger, I mean my bra which was a bit small before is feeling really tight now and I probably should take…oh” almost as though it knew it was being mentioned there was a twang from underneath the increasingly taxed dress (that now resembled a sleeveless shirt) and part of a black bra slid out. “Well that saves me the trouble then,” said Sonakshi deftly pulling the bra out and discarding it. “and you know when I said it was only my belly and breast that have grown, I have recently discovered that some of it has been going to my…um derriere,” she said blushing and turned around, at the back her dress only reached the top of her buttocks meaning there was a clear view of a pair of butt cheeks each as large and firm as a soccer ball and an extremely taxed pair of black underwear, assumedly the counterpart to the bra that had been recently removed. “It’s like I have a couple of footballs back there,” she said trying to look over at her massive rear, “as in soccer footballs,” she clarified.
She started turn back around to face the camera and stopped part way through her rotation to give a profile view of her figure. “I mean just look how big my belly is I can’t even reach my belly button,” she said giving a demonstration. She turned to face the camera again, “something crazy is happening to me, I was going to wait until the morning but this,” she gestured to the swollen parts of her body, “is not normal, so I’m going to call the hospital,” she reached over towards the phone but was interrupted but a loud moan from her engorged abdomen, which caused her to shudder, “maybe I should get some more food first,” she said cancelling her first call and dialling another number. “So yeah, if I don’t put a video tomorrow it’s because I’m in the hospi…hello Pizza-2-Go? I would like to place an or…” she said as her hand not holding the phone turned off the webcam.

“What is wrong with that woman?” said Alissa as the video came to an end, “why isn’t she going to the hospital?”
“So I have convinced you then?” ask Christine with a grin on her face.
Alissa paused before saying, “I’m not say that it is alien, I’m just saying that if that happened to me I would go to a doctor.”
“I don’t think she was a particularly outgoing person, I watched a few of her vlogs before these and she really focused on her work,” said Christine
“Her belly was the size of octomom’s! She said it herself, even you would know something was up if that had happen,” said Alissa.
“…well,” said Christine pausing for suspense, “maybe it’s like a parasite, like those ones that makes mice not afraid of cats or the ones that makes caterpillars climb onto exposed branches so the parasite can get into a bird.”
“So are you saying that the al…” began Alissa before stopping herself, “are you saying that what ever is inside of her is controlling her mind?”
“No but influencing her,” said Christine, “every time she thinks about going to the doctor’s it distracts her desires.”
“With hunger,” said Alissa “every time she thinks about getting examined ‘it’ makes her hungry.”
“I mean the alien probably is already making very hungry to make her eat enough for her to grow it inside her, you can’t grow something without nothing,” said Christine, “but yeah they probably evolved a mechanism to demand more food anytime they sense some fear hormone in its host so they can’t get found out, plus the more she eats the bigger and faster the aliens grow.”
“I doubt they would get big though,” said Alissa.

15132221111222122222111.content:
Christine didn’t say anything and just started the next video.
This time Sonakshi was standing side on to the computer’s camera, “Ooh,” she winced in discomfort before talking, “me again, I know I normally don’t yahdy yah, I haven’t gone to the hospital yet but I was just sooo hungry I need to eat and, so yeah I grew somewhat again,” she said blushing slightly. She shuffled back from the camera and Christine gave a small nod as Alissa gasped, Sonakshi’s belly was just as large as Sofie’s (the volleyball player from Christine’s previous example) and while Alissa was able to convince her self that the Swede’s swollen exercise ball sized belly was some sort of computer trickery, seeing the archaeologist waddle around with an abdomen was hard to be sceptical at, Alisa felt kind of sorry for the woman, her massive belly with it’s large protruding navel seemed so tight, there were surprisingly no stretch marks on the swollen hazel coloured orb but it seemed so taut and heavy it looked like it would burst like a balloon at any moment, Alisa was surprised that the woman was able to stand without it touching the ground. Her belly was so big it could fit the rest of her inside it…possibly, definitely her before she got…pregnant but Sonakshi’s belly was not the only thing that had been growing, her bountiful breast free from the bra were only a bit smaller than the woman’s head, whilst buttocks had grown so large and round that it appear as though she expecting a set of twins in her rear with one baby per a cheek, it was surprising that the woman’s underpants (stretched as they were) had not snapped.

“I’m speaking a bit louder not only because I’m so far away,” Sonakshi said as she slowly turned around to give of a full view of her swollen body, “but my belly keeps making noises,” she fell silent and Alisa could hear it, what she had thought be either a whir of the computer, traffic outside, or a washing machine in another room was in fact a low near constant moaning emanating from the woman’s engorged middle.
“I’m not surprised it is so loud,” said Sonakshi side on to the camera again, “I have had a lot of food, I should probably check to see if it is more than anyone in one day,” she said side stepping slightly closer to the camera, “and it’s working overtime to digest all of it,” she continued her hands lightly caressed the taut skin of her belly. “All of the food in my massive bell…” she trailed off as a small peak temporarily formed on her belly, near where she was rubbing, as something from inside her kicked.
For the first time Alisa saw true horror on the woman’s face as she tentatively prodded where the mound had just been, a few seconds after she did her offspring kicked again, then another kicked appeared on the sphere of her belly, then another and another. Sonakshi clutched her belly and winced in discomfort as whatever was inside her erupted in a frenzy of movement, an animalist moan of pain escaped the woman’s lips barely audible over the groaning of her belly.

Then as suddenly as it had begun the movement from within had stopped. Sonakshi looked panicked, she had clearly had forgotten about the blog as when she turned and rushed to the phone, her belly slammed into the side table, that the laptop must have been sitting on, like a wrecking ball. Surprisingly the computer survived the fall as the table it was on keeled over and even gave a view of Sonakshi (though now from the ground up and at a slight angle) as she crossed over the phone and hammered the emergency number in frantically, but as she went to raise the phone to her head a trance seemed to come over Sonakshi and instead of placing the phone on ear she put it into her mouth and took a bite out of it, Alissa covered her mouth and watched in horror and the woman chewed the plastic and wiring before swallowing and taking another bit, as her belly wobbled slightly and began to bubble happily, then the video ended.

“are you sure this isn’t part of some independent horror film project,” said Alissa, “like a found footage thing.”
“I haven’t found a film containing this,” said Christine scrolling down, “there’s one more video,” she said.

Alissa prepared herself for what she would see but she still what taken aback when she saw the person in the final video.
It was possible to see woman of Sonakshi, her arms, shoulders, back, faces and lower legs all appeared unchanged by her ordeal, but that seemed like a small thing compared to the rest of her body. Like cell infected by a virus Sonakshi’s body main purpose seemed to have been changed from its own survival to being a host for the constant reproduction of its invader, and like an infected cell she seemed close to bursting.
Her breasts had now surpassed the size of her head and barely contained by her dress which now resemble a sports bra, her hips had widened and bottom looked like it was carrying sextuplets on its own with each cheek being the size and approximate shape of a small beachball, needless to say her underpants had already snapped.
But all this seemed trivial next to Sonakshi’s belly, Alissa didn’t know how many the woman appeared to be having, 30? 40? 50? She looked ready to give birth to a hippotumus, a fully groan one. Alissa had thought the woman’s apartment looked small to begin with and now most of it was taken up by the pulsating sphere that was her belly.
There was so much movement from within her belly it looked to Alisa like a tent with several people moving around inside of it, but unlike a tent which went from laxed to stretched Sonakshi’s belly went from taut to even tighter.
The movement and sounds coming from her belly were not uniform either, some parts wobbled and bubbled, other parts groaned as it received kicks from within, while other sections merely seemed to ‘bloop’ in both sound and movement, it was as though her belly was a factory with different activities taking place in different areas of her expansive belly.
When she had gotten over the shock of incredibly swollen fertile state Sonakshi’s body Alisa noticed other strange things. Several bottles littered the floor, one was a drain cleaning product, another was a bottle shampoo, all of them have had their lids taken off…bitten off, corrected Alissa herself as she noticed the bite makes on the bottles, and their contents drained. The sofa in the apartment seemed to have one arm rest torn open and the other one gnawed away entirely.
“Did she…” Alissa began to ask but Christine held up a finger to silence her.

Sonakshi’s had picked the computer up from the floor, how she had managed to do such a thing was anyone guess, her belly seem to be too large and heavy to move. She rested the laptop somewhere on her swollen abdomen and started to make a panicked plea to the camera but was barely able to get her words out between her burps and moans of discomforts all the while her belly was making threatening groaning noises so loud it threatened to drown her voice out.
“If anyone is currently watURRRP, if anyone is watching I need an ambulOOOORRRH,” Sonakshi made such a gut-filled moan it sounded like she was trying pass out a small car, which for all Alissa knew she was.
“I need an ambulance now, there is something growing inside me, making me eat and it’s feels like it’s trying to OOOOOOHUUURRP” she said as a moan of pain became a burp.
“I need anything, I’m at numbOOOOOORRH,” as she gave another moan a bright light seemed to fill the apartment and then the video finished.

There was a moment of silence which was even more poignant after the organic cacophony that Sonakshi was making from the video.
“What happened to her,” asked Alissa carefully, afraid of what the answer would be.
“Oh she’s alive,” said Christine opening up another tab and finding a picture. It showed Sonakshi at what looked like an excavation, she seemed much like she did before her ordeal her belly was gone though… “She got a promotion afterwards, I’m guessing going up several cup sizes would do that,” Christine said with only the smallest hint of bitterness. Alissa looked back to the picture, Sonakshi’s breasts while not as large as they had been in the last video (or the second last one for that matter) were still much larger than they were beforehand. Her bottom also was larger than it was before her experience, while not the monstrous thing it was by the end Sonakshi’s rear was the size and shape that would make it stand out in most rap videos.
“Does she remembered what happened to her?” asked Alissa.
“None of it,” replied Christine, “even when people sent her the vlogs,” she continued going back to the home page of the website, “she ended up stopping her vlogs because she was so annoyed with people asking her about it.
“And why hasn’t the government looked into this?” asked Alissa in a final attempt to remain a bit sceptical
“Who says they haven’t?” replied Christine.
