151322211112221222221112.content:
Nicole had a difficult time taking the pregnancy test, here engorged body made her incredibly ungainly and her swollen breasts, and bulging belly in particular block her view of anything beneath her protruding navel. Despite this she left the bathroom a few minutes later, and passed the test to Dr Porter, who gave it a shake and said, “this should hopefully give us some answers soon,” she said peering at the stick.

It wasn’t too long before the doctor said, “here we go…well congratulations Ms Sterling.”
“WHAT!” exclaimed Nicole, there was no way she could be pregnant, her body may look it, very much so, but she had not engaged in sexual activity or anything that could possibly lead her to becoming pregnant.
“See for yourself,” said the doctor holding out the stick, which display the positive result, “now these things aren’t 100% accurate but given…” Dr Porter paused trying to think of the tactful way of putting, “…all the other evidence,” she said waving her hand Nicole’s swollen frame, “it seems the most likely expla…oh”
She stopped again as the reading on the pregnancy test changed again, both women looked in surprise as the readout panel on the stick turned a bright glowing green.
Vanessa Porter dropped the test in shock, “what's that meant to mean?” ask Nicole anxiously.
“I don’t know,” said the doctor checking the box from which the test had come from.

Turning slightly (as her belly was preventing her from seeing the ground directly in front of her) Nicole looked at the dropped test even from the ground the bright green seemed apparent it was so bright and unnatural it seemed to glow.
Dr Porter was typing on the computer, “we don’t have an ultrasound at this facility but I will write you a referral to have one at Sacred Grove Hospital.”
Suddenly a wave of terror came Nicole, the feeling started in her distended stomach and emanated through her body.
“Are you s-sure that’s wise,” she blurted out.
“Miss Sterling, I don’t know going on with you but whatever it is it’s not normal.”
She reached out a hand to give Nicole a comforting pat, but Nicole in her influenced fearful state instinctively took a step back her hands unconsciously moving in front of her vast belly (as best they could) in a protective embrace.
There were a few seconds of silence except for the slight bubbling gurgle from Nicole’s immensely bloated middle.
“I’m mean, your right,” said Nicole regaining some control over her thoughts.
“I will send a message ahead,” said Vanessa Porter, “Do you need…” she thought of a tactful way to say it, “transportation?”
“N-no, I can get there myself,” said Nicole.

Dr Porter watched Nicole waddle out of the room, and marvelled at the size of Nicole’s hips and behind, she turned to her computer and opened up an email to write to Sacred Grove, when her stomach gave a rumble and enormous wave of hunger came over her, “I’ll send it later,” she said closing the email. She left the room heading to the closet source of food she could think of, while one hand absentmindedly rubbed her, for the moment flat, stomach.
151322211112221222221112.title: Follow Someone else

1513222111122212222211122.content:
It was dark by the time Alissa got to her place with Christine, she was going to get to the bottom of what was going on with her mother. Alissa told her friend that she didn’t need her to come but Christine insisted on providing support, even if that mean she needed to get a taxi or uber back to her place. There were some lights on, suggesting that Nicole, or someone else, was already there.

As soon as she crossed the threshold of her house Alissa’s determination broke.
“Look Christine, I appreciate you coming to help me with this but after all that you showed me today I’m not sure if…, I mean I still need to…”
“Digest it all,” finished Christine looking around eagerly for evidence of aliens.
“Yeah, I’m going to sleep on it, maybe it will all be sorted out by morning”, Alissa making her way to the staircase.
“Over by tomorrow…” said Christine to herself, lost in thought.
“Yeah, like it is all a bad dread or something,” said Alissa not noticing her friend’s reverie, “I’ll let you know how it goes tomorrow at school, just remember to lock the front door on your way out, night.”
“Right night…” said Christine as Alissa went to her room upstairs.

Christine waited until she heard the door to Alissa’s room, open and then close again, before moving. Alissa probably didn’t want her to look around, though she hadn’t directly forbidden it. Christine made her way to the kitchen first, based upon Nicole’s behaviour earlier it seemed the most likely place to start looking.
Nicole wasn’t in the kitchen though it was pretty obvious she had been there at some point; the discarded remains of food packets and containers littered the floor (all of course empty). No attempt to prepare or cook anything seemed to have been made though. While there seemed to be no pattern to detritus on the ground, Christine imaged how ravenously hungry her friend’s mother must have been to leave such scene, a small trail was leading out of the another doorway at the other end of the kitchen.
Following the trail Christine saw that it led into what she knew to be Nicole’s room, and the door was open. Creeping up to the doorway she peered into the room, the light was off, but she could see Nicole or something else was on the bed.
She didn’t know if Nicole was asleep or awake but she had come too far to back out now, Christine turned on the light.

Like with the kitchen the floor of the bedroom was littered with empty food packets, there were also quite a few on the bed but they were overshadowed (both metaphorically and literally) by Nicole.
Nicole was lying on her back roughly in the centre of the bed, she was gently rubbing her belly had grown noticeably since Christine had last saw her, the same size and shape as a small beachball, the round mass towered over the rest of her. Nicole had taken off her shoes but still wearing her sock, she was also still wearing (as best she could) the same pants as earlier, though her button up shirt had been removed leaving her top half uncovered except for a lacy black bra that seemed to be having a tough time containing Nicole’s now rather ample bosom. Nicole must have been awake as she sat up (with some difficulty) to see who it was.

“Oh, it’s you I thought you might have be…ooh,” began Nicole before clutching at her belly as wave of pain swept across it, presumably from it being packed to bursting point with food again.
“Mrs Sterling?” said Christine hesitantly, slowly making her was closer to the swollen woman.
“I can expl…ooorrf,” Nicole began before once again being stopped by the discomfort that her body was experiencing.
“Mrs Sterling it’s alright,” said Christine now on the bed and slowly reaching out to Nicole’s bloated abdomen.
Nicole not seeing this tried to say, “You should g…ooorrgh,” but once again was unable to.
“Here let me help,” said Christine and began to rub Nicole’s belly.
This seemed to do the trick as the pain in Nicole’s stomach went from intense waves to a constant yet dull throb.

“Thank you,” Nicole sitting back against the headboard of her bed, as Christine continued to gently rub the sphere of her belly.
“No probably,” said Christine.
“Today has be one crazy experience.”
“I expect it has been.”
“I can’t believe how much I have eaten,” she gestured to the packets of food around the place, “and this is only a tiny fraction of what I have eaten today.”
“It’s ok, your body needs a lot of sustenance given what you are carrying,” said Christine.
“What I’m car…” Nicole began to ask, but at that point Christine’s thumb clipped the large protruding nub that was Nicole’s navel causing Nicole’s entire body to blissfully shudder as a tingle shot through it, wiping Christine’s last statement from her mind.

The two remained there for several minutes, Nicole feeling more relaxed then she had all day, while Christine greedily rubbed the older woman’s massive middle, eagerly taking in every detail. She particularly enjoyed feeling the movement from within Nicole’s belly, not sure if it was to poor woman’s digestive tract trying in vain to deal with all the food stuffed into it or the extra-terrestrial brood growing with in her.
A fainting bubbling started inside the depths of Nicole and Christine excitedly leaned forward, placing an ear to Nicole’s vast bump her caressing increasing in intensity in her excitement. The faster and more vigorously she rubbed the louder the bubbling got, causing Christine to get more excited and her to rub Nicole’s belly with even more force. Nicole winced in discomfort as whatever was making the noise inside her seemed to become dislodged, “Christine dear maybe you could,” she started.
Christine looked up partly in response to Nicole talking but mainly to follow the noise travel up Nicole’s body to her head and…
“URRRRRRPPPP,” Nicole let out the loudest belch she had all day, right into the face of Christine.
“I’m sorry,” said Nicole her face turning red in embarrassment, "That keeps...happening."
“It’s ok,” said Christine, slightly light headed from the strength of the belch, “you have a lot going on inside you as your body wouldn’t be used to carrying such a burden,” she said patting Nicole’s belly and accidentally brushed the woman’s outie causing Nicole to once again shudder in bliss as a tingle coursed through out her. Christine thought it might be a good time to leave, in case Alissa came down stair looking for what made the noise. “I should get going,” she said, Nicole just moaned in response.

As Christine left the Sterlings' house (locking up as she did), she thought about how best to record the information she had gather currently unaware that she was leaving with more than just data…

A shy girl since moving Ayano hadn't made any friends and only had regular communication with her boss; the middle aged, pale blonde haired and elegant, Mrs Emily Rochen Co director to the Atarashīdesu Pharmacy West Coast American branch. The only other person she regularly communicated to was her landlord, who Ayano had never even met and just paid rent into and received letters left in front of the door to her cramped apartment. She saw other people; work colleges, baristas and other people from her day to day life but felt so nervous talking to people that she hadn't struck up even an acquaintance, little lone a friend. A father wasn't mandatory for raising the children, she could provide more then enough love them by herself, but a father was kind of necessary for the having the children in the first place. So despite her pretty face the she had always been single since moving as a result of her shyness unlikely to achieve her dream of motherhood.
It was also as a result of her shyness that she was leaving work late tonight, on Friday there was often a hepatic and loud rush to leave which Ayano always wish to avoid so she would often wait a few hours before leaving as to avoid it, it also had the added bonus that she avoided all the rush hour traffic jams but it had the drawback of it was often nightfall before she left, as it was tonight.

155311.content:
The lecture hall broke into whispering as Professor Kun Lin walked into class, mainly for the way she chose to present herself to the class.

Kun was always rather formally dressed, but when she went into the field, she dressed mainly for comfort. So, it was a shock to her students to see her walk into the class with her blouse tied up, her stomach exposed.

“I can hear all of your whispering, and I’m going to explain why I’m dressed like this: I’m pregnant.” Kun declares in front of her desk in the lecture hall, leading to the whispering to grow louder.

Kun takes a microphone, hooking it to her blouse.

“Now, in the field of archaeology, you’re going to make some strange discoveries. And I must inform you all: the baby isn’t human.” She puts a hand to her still flat stomach. She reaches into her bag, pulling out a jar with a thin rectangle cut out of the lid. “Now,” She puts it down on her desk, “I must inform you that I’m bearing an egg, and it may or may not grow.”

A student toward the front of the class raises her hand. “Umm… Professor? What do you mean it’s an egg? And what’s the jar for?”

“Well, Kara, while on the field, we discovered a small, undeveloped egg. And long story short, I’m the host for the time being. And the jar, well… I know that in public, people like to touch pregnant stranger’s bellies, so I’m going to set something up. Here is a jar, and you will put money in it, and the proceeds will go to the children’s hospital.” She turns the computer on the desk on, the projector hanging from the ceiling whirring into life.

The screen gradually lowers, showing a price chart.

“Now, if my belly should grow, then you must pay a quarter to touch it, and it can be for no longer than ten seconds. Pay fifty, up to a minute. A dollar will get you ten second belly-touching sessions for the period, while two will get you full minute sessions for the whole period. However, these sessions cannot be while I’m lecturing. But, I’ve got a lot of silent study prepared for you all so I can monitor the egg.”

The same student raises her hand again, “Umm… why are you letting us touch your stomach, again?”

“Because strangers feel the need to believe pregnant women are like Buddhas. But if you pay, then I’ll act like a Buddha for you, however, there’s more payment options: three dollars will get you a single ten second touching session, bare bellied. Pay less, you get a clothed belly. Five dollars, full minute of bare belly touching, but you also have the option to rub. By the way, all options that are five dollars are more allowing rubbing.”

Kun presses a button on her projector remote, more payment options available.

“Should the egg hatch and the creature within start to move, for ten dollars, I’ll declare it if you wish to feel it, but it will be brief. For twenty, you can feel longer. However, you do take a backseat toward people who pay more, as people who pay thirty, for the week, I will actively seek you out to let you feel for ten seconds first. But you’re second in line for people who pay fifty, as I will seek them out first, letting them feel for up to a minute. A hundred, and for a full month, should it even take that long, you get to randomly approach me during silent study to rub my belly, assuming I’m not having an ultrasound done. You also get to instigate movement, assuming the egg hatches inside my body. And finally, for two hundred, for the remainder of the pregnancy, you can interact with my belly whenever you feel like, and you even get to kiss it, but there’s one rule to this: if I find out you actively seek me out to do so, and only to do so, I will not hesitate to report you for stalking. However, should we randomly bump into each other, or you seek me out for academic reasons, rub away. Any questions?”

Kara raises her hand again, being the only student to do so thus far.

“Yes, Kara?”

“Are we allowed to speak to the egg in your womb?” Kara asks out of curiosity.

“Quietly, yes. Silent study is called ‘silent study’ for a reason, but you can still whisper.”

No one in their seats raised their hand, until once again, Kara did.

“Does anyone besides Kara have a question?” Kun observes her students faces, every single one completely dumbstruck, as if they could not comprehend a single word they heard. All but one: Kara. Sighing, “Yes, Kara”

“How did you get pregnant with an egg?”
155311.title: Egg pregnancy

choices: Kara gave the full two hundred!
1553112.content:
“Well, during a dig, we found a rather large egg with odd lips at the top. As we approached it, the lips opened, and before I knew it, something jumped out and clung to me for dear life. After a few minutes, it fell off and died, and when I was examined, we discovered it had planted an egg in my uterus. I initially wanted it removed, but… I was persuaded with… let’s just say some rather generous grants to carry it to term.” Kun places her hand over her navel, clicking the remote.

An image of a pregnant woman with her belly exposed it up on the screen. “Is anyone disgusted by this image?” Kun asks the class, only to have silence respond. “No? Then we won’t have a problem, then. Now, I have readings assigned to you all, pages two hundred to two-twenty.” Kun turns off her microphone, sitting at her desk.

With tunnel vision taking over, Kun picks up the transducer connected to her classroom computer, quickly jabbing it into her stomach.

On the screen, a small round object sits perfectly still.

“Hmm… it’s a bit bigger than the last time.” She whispers to herself.

“What do you mean last time?” Kara suddenly whispers to her professor, making her jump in her seat.

“You scared me, Kara! What do you need? Are you unable to make it to your appointment today?”

Kara struggled in her archaeology course, so she constantly set up appointments with Professor Lin, and although it did not help her pass with flying colors, it stopped her from sinking.

“Oh, no. I just made a donation.”

Kun looks at the jar, finding green bills sitting in the jar already.

“Kara, I just made the announcement today, you’re not feeling anything since I’m still flat.”

“Well…” Kara blushes.

Kun looks carefully at the jar, counting...

choices: Jasmine wakes up a little bloated and nauseous in the morning.
Upon waking, she screams when she sees how massive she became overnight.
*Cosmic reset: alternate version of this scenario.*
155331211.content:
Jasmine was glad that she could finally lock up for the day; the heat was just starting to get unbearable. Her shirt clung to her body and no amount of tugging or rearranging would prevent it from quickly resuming that uncomfortable situation. Doing her best to dislodge her hair from her forehead, Jasmine weaved through the still bustling sidewalks until she eventually reached her car.

Flopping down in the seat, the snowy haired woman instantly yelped and regretted her haste; the seat was nearly blisteringly hot after baking in the hot sun. Gritting her teeth, she eventually managed to get the fans to vent the interior enough that she wouldn’t fry herself. Only after she settled down in the still unpleasantly warm seat did she notice the little paper wrapped box sitting on the passenger seat. It looked like it might have been slipped in through the cracked window.

Picking it up, she pulled the string off and opened up the wrapping, and saw that there was a note written on the inside: Just a little gift to help you with your dream. It was only signed as being from a secret admirer. Despite the rampant heat, Jasmine felt a chill go down her spine as her head snapped up and looked around for anyone notable, but couldn’t find anyone out of the ordinary. She had never told anyone about that dream, surely this note couldn’t be referring to that…could it?

Suppressing a shiver, she hesitantly opened up the box, not sure what she was going to find inside. After all that she had running through her mind, it was actually a bit of a letdown when she saw a worn silver ring within. It wasn’t too bad to look at, especially with that odd etched design running around the outside of the band, but the age was apparent with the wear and tear on the metal. Most of her fear left her and she chuckled to herself as she plucked the ring from its box; she got all worked up over nothing, someone just gave her a ring with a vague cryptic message, that was all. It might not even have been meant for her to get.

Her mind more at ease, she slipped the ring on and stared at it for a second before turning her attention to getting out into traffic and back to her home. With her attention focused elsewhere, Jasmine never noticed the pale glow within the metal that quickly spread into her finger before fading away. The rest of her night passed almost completely uneventfully, any misgivings about the odd ring she had been gifted fading away. The only somewhat odd occurrence was that she ate more than she usually did, but that was easily shrugged off. After a cool shower to wash away the remains of the hot day, Jasmine dropped onto her bed leaving the covers off to combat the still lingering heat and drifted off to sleep.
155331211.title: The life changing gift
